shows.name: The Bachelor
shows.description: The original dating competition where one bachelor dates 25+ women over the course of several weeks, with rose ceremonies eliminating contestants until a final proposal. For over two decades, The Bachelor has defined reality TV romance, spawning countless engagements and a passionate fan community known as Bachelor Nation.
shows.longDescription: Since its premiere in 2002, The Bachelor has become a cultural phenomenon that has redefined dating television. Each season follows a single bachelor as he narrows down a pool of potential partners through romantic one-on-one dates, group adventures, and the iconic rose ceremonies. The show has filmed in over 50 countries, from the romantic streets of Paris to the beaches of Thailand, creating some of reality TV's most memorable moments. The Bachelor Mansion in Agoura Hills, California, has become one of the most recognizable homes in television history.

faqs.question: Where is The Bachelor Mansion located?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor Mansion, officially named Villa de la Vina, is located at 2351 Kanan Road in Agoura Hills, California, about 35 miles northwest of downtown Los Angeles in the Santa Monica Mountains. The 10-acre estate features Mediterranean architecture, stunning gardens, and that iconic driveway.

faqs.question: Can you visit The Bachelor Mansion?
faqs.answer: Yes! The Bachelor Mansion is available for rent on Airbnb. Nightly rates range from $6,000 to $30,000 depending on the season. The property hosts weddings, proposals, and special events when not filming. Many couples have gotten engaged on the same spot as their favorite Bachelor moments.

faqs.question: How long has The Bachelor filmed at the mansion?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor has filmed at Villa de la Vina since Season 11 in 2007. The production rents the property for approximately 42 days per season. Before this mansion, the show used different locations including a mansion in Malibu.

faqs.question: What international destinations has The Bachelor visited?
faqs.answer: The Bachelor has traveled to over 50 countries including France, Italy, Switzerland, Thailand, New Zealand, Iceland, the Bahamas, Malta, Spain, and many more. Fantasy Suite destinations often include Santorini, Bali, and the Maldives.

travelTips: Book the Bachelor Mansion months in advance - it fills up fast during proposal season
Visit Agoura Hills in spring for the best garden views
The nearby Malibu Wine Safari offers similar wine country vibes
Consider a helicopter tour to see the property from above

meta.title: The Bachelor Filming Locations | Every Destination, Resort & Date Spot
meta.description: Complete guide to every Bachelor filming location across 29 seasons. Visit the Bachelor Mansion, Fantasy Suite resorts, international destinations, and hometown date spots.

shows.name: The Bachelorette
shows.description: The gender-swapped spinoff where one bachelorette dates 25+ men, traveling to exotic destinations before choosing her final rose recipient. The Bachelorette has proven equally compelling, with leads like Trista Rehn, JoJo Fletcher, and Rachel Lindsay becoming household names.
shows.longDescription: Launched as a spinoff in 2003 with The Bachelor's rejected contestant Trista Rehn, The Bachelorette quickly became appointment television in its own right. The show follows a single woman as she dates multiple suitors, traveling from the Bachelor Mansion to exotic locales around the world. The format allows viewers to watch one woman's journey through romance, heartbreak, and ultimately (hopefully) love.

faqs.question: Does The Bachelorette film at the Bachelor Mansion?
faqs.answer: Yes, The Bachelorette uses the same Bachelor Mansion (Villa de la Vina) for the first few weeks of filming before traveling to various domestic and international destinations. The mansion provides the iconic backdrop for those first night arrivals and early rose ceremonies.

faqs.question: What are the most romantic Bachelorette destinations?
faqs.answer: Fan favorites include Santorini, Greece for its stunning sunsets, the Scottish Highlands for dramatic landscapes, Thailand for its beautiful temples and beaches, and New Zealand for adventure dates like bungee jumping and helicopter tours.

travelTips: Santorini's Oia is especially magical at sunset - arrive early for the best spots
Scotland filming locations often include historic castles open for tours
Book a Thailand temple tour similar to the cultural dates on the show

meta.title: The Bachelorette Filming Locations | Complete Destination Guide
meta.description: Explore every Bachelorette filming location. From the iconic mansion to fantasy suite destinations around the world.

shows.name: Love Is Blind
shows.description: Singles try to find love sight unseen in dating pods before meeting face-to-face, getting engaged, and deciding whether to marry at the altar. The groundbreaking Netflix hit has expanded to multiple countries and proven that emotional connection can precede physical attraction.
shows.longDescription: Love Is Blind revolutionized dating television with its unique premise: contestants form emotional connections through conversations in isolated pods, getting engaged before ever seeing each other. Created by Chris Coelen, the show has become a global phenomenon with versions in Brazil, Japan, Germany, Sweden, the UK, and more. The US version has spawned viral moments, from the infamous gold wine glasses to dramatic altar decisions that have captivated millions of viewers worldwide.

faqs.question: Where are the Love Is Blind pods located?
faqs.answer: The Love Is Blind pods are located at LA North Studios in Santa Clarita, California. Season 1 filmed at Trilith Studios in Fayetteville, Georgia. The pods are approximately 12x12 feet each, with a blue couch on one side and a gold couch on the other.

faqs.question: Where does Love Is Blind film the Mexico retreat?
faqs.answer: Love Is Blind has filmed couple retreats at Grand Velas Riviera Maya (Seasons 1, 5), TRS Coral Hotel in Canc√∫n (Season 2), TRS Yucatan (Season 4), and various all-inclusive resorts in Mexico's Riviera Maya. These resorts offer the perfect romantic backdrop for newly engaged couples.

faqs.question: Can you book the Love Is Blind resort?
faqs.answer: Yes! The Mexico resorts used for Love Is Blind are publicly bookable. Grand Velas Riviera Maya starts around $800-1,500/night all-inclusive, and TRS Hotels range from $400-1,000/night, all-inclusive. Request a room in the zen section for the same villa experience.

faqs.question: What cities has Love Is Blind filmed in?
faqs.answer: Love Is Blind has featured singles from Atlanta (Seasons 1, 7), Chicago (Season 2), Dallas (Season 3), Seattle (Season 4), Houston (Season 5), Charlotte (Season 6), and Washington DC (Season 7). Each season explores different neighborhoods and venues in these cities.

travelTips: Grand Velas offers the exact pool and beach setup from the show
Request the Ambassador or Grand Class suites for the villa experience
Atlanta's Buckhead neighborhood has many filming locations
Chicago's River North area features heavily in Season 2

meta.title: Love Is Blind Filming Locations | Pods, Mexico Resorts & City Venues
meta.description: Complete guide to Love Is Blind filming locations. Visit the pods in Santa Clarita, book the Mexico retreat resorts, and explore date venues in all 9 cities.

shows.name: Too Hot to Handle
shows.tagline: No kissing. No sex. No self-gratification.
shows.description: Attractive singles must abstain from sexual contact to win a $100,000 prize while living together in a luxury villa monitored by AI assistant Lana. The show has become known for its stunning villa locations and cheeky humor.
shows.longDescription: Too Hot to Handle took Netflix by storm with its unique twist: gorgeous singles are placed in a tropical paradise but cannot engage in any physical intimacy or they lose money from the prize fund. The show's AI host, Lana, monitors their behavior while contestants participate in workshops designed to help them form deeper emotional connections. The series has spawned international versions and become synonymous with its stunning villa locations.

faqs.question: Where is the Too Hot to Handle villa?
faqs.answer: Too Hot to Handle has filmed at multiple stunning villas: Casa Tau in Punta Mita, Mexico (Season 1), Turtle Tail Estate in Turks and Caicos (Seasons 2-3), and Emerald Pavilion in Turks and Caicos (Seasons 4-6). Each villa features infinity pools, ocean views, and luxury amenities.

faqs.question: Can you rent the Too Hot to Handle villa?
faqs.answer: Yes! Casa Tau rents for $11,500-15,660/night through Casa Bay Villas and sleeps up to 22 guests. Emerald Pavilion rents for $8,700-27,000/night and accommodates 18 guests. Turtle Tail Estate was sold for $20.25 million and is no longer available for rent.

faqs.question: What amenities do the THTH villas have?
faqs.answer: The villas feature infinity pools, private beaches, full staff including chefs and butlers, outdoor dining areas, fire pits, and multiple bedroom suites. Casa Tau includes a spa, gym, and private pier. Emerald Pavilion has an elevator, wine cellar, and floating dock.

travelTips: Book Casa Tau for a group trip - it sleeps 22 and has full staff
Punta Mita offers world-class surfing and golf nearby
Turks and Caicos' Grace Bay Beach is consistently rated best in the world
Visit during shoulder season (May-June) for lower rates

meta.title: Too Hot to Handle Villa Locations | Rent the THTH House
meta.description: Rent the Too Hot to Handle villas! Complete guide to Casa Tau ($11,500/night), Emerald Pavilion ($8,700/night), and all THTH filming locations.

shows.name: Love Island USA
shows.description: Singles couple up in a villa and compete in challenges while viewers vote for their favorite couples. New arrivals shake up existing relationships in this addictive summer romance series.
shows.longDescription: Love Island USA brings the massively popular British format to American audiences, with contestants living in a villa and coupling up to survive elimination. The show is known for its chaotic drama, Casa Amor twist (where couples are separated and tempted by new singles), and viewer voting that determines which couples stay or go. After moving between Las Vegas, Hawaii, and Santa Barbara, the show found its permanent home in Fiji.

faqs.question: Where is the Love Island USA villa?
faqs.answer: Love Island USA Seasons 5-7 film at a custom-built 45,000 square foot villa in Fiji's Mamanuca Islands. The villa was constructed specifically for the show and includes multiple bedroom suites, a massive pool area, fire pit, and outdoor shower. Earlier seasons filmed in Las Vegas (S2), Hawaii (S3), and Santa Barbara (S4).

faqs.question: Can you visit the Love Island USA villa in Fiji?
faqs.answer: The Love Island USA villa is custom-built for production and not publicly available. However, nearby resorts like Sheraton Tokoriki Island and Matamanoa Island Resort offer similar Fiji experiences with crystal-clear waters and luxury accommodations.

faqs.question: What is Casa Amor on Love Island?
faqs.answer: Casa Amor is a second villa where half the contestants are sent to be tempted by new singles. It's a pivotal moment each season that tests relationships and often results in dramatic recouplings. The Casa Amor villa is usually located near the main villa.

travelTips: Fiji's Mamanuca Islands offer similar vibes to the show's setting
Stay at Sheraton Tokoriki for the closest experience to the villa
Book a private island resort for ultimate Love Island fantasy
Visit during Fiji's dry season (May-October) for best weather

meta.title: Love Island USA Villa Location | Fiji, Las Vegas & All Filming Sites
meta.description: Where is the Love Island USA villa? Complete guide to the Fiji villa, Casa Amor locations, and all 7 seasons of filming locations.

shows.name: Bachelor in Paradise
shows.description: Bachelor Nation alumni get a second chance at love in a tropical paradise, with rose ceremonies determining who stays and new arrivals shaking up relationships. The spin-off has become a fan favorite for its drama and successful relationships.
shows.longDescription: Bachelor in Paradise brings together fan favorites and villains from The Bachelor and Bachelorette for a second chance at love. Set in a beachside resort, contestants couple up, go on dates, and navigate the drama of new arrivals who threaten existing relationships. The show has produced some of Bachelor Nation's most beloved couples and is known for its more relaxed, comedic tone compared to the main shows.

faqs.question: Where is Bachelor in Paradise filmed?
faqs.answer: Bachelor in Paradise filmed at Playa Escondida Resort in Sayulita, Mexico for Seasons 2-9 (2015-2023). Season 10 (2025) moved to Azura Beach Resort in Playa Samara, Costa Rica for a fresh setting.

faqs.question: Can you stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort?
faqs.answer: Yes! Playa Escondida Resort in Sayulita is fully bookable ($165-495/night) and proudly markets itself as the BIP filming location. The new Azura Beach Resort in Costa Rica is also publicly bookable. You can literally sleep in the same beds as your favorite contestants.

faqs.question: What is the Boom Boom Room on Bachelor in Paradise?
faqs.answer: The Boom Boom Room is the only air-conditioned room at Playa Escondida Resort, where couples can have private time. It has become iconic in BIP lore and is equipped with hidden cameras for the show. Regular guests can actually book this room!

faqs.question: What is Sayulita like as a destination?
faqs.answer: Sayulita is a charming surf town about 45 minutes from Puerto Vallarta. It's known for its colorful streets, excellent restaurants, surf breaks, and laid-back vibe. Many BIP fans combine a resort stay with exploring the town's galleries, cafes, and beaches.

travelTips: Stay at Playa Escondida during off-season (Sept-Nov) for lower rates
Sayulita has amazing street tacos and craft cocktails
Book a surf lesson at one of the town's many schools
Don't miss the colorful cemetery with ocean views

meta.title: Bachelor in Paradise Filming Location | Playa Escondida & Azura Resort
meta.description: Stay at the Bachelor in Paradise resort! Book Playa Escondida in Mexico ($165/night) or the new Azura Beach Resort in Costa Rica. Complete visitor guide.

shows.name: Perfect Match
shows.description: Netflix reality star alumni compete to form the strongest couples through strategic matchmaking, living together in a tropical villa. The crossover event brings together personalities from across Netflix's dating show universe.
shows.longDescription: Perfect Match is Netflix's ambitious crossover dating show that brings together contestants from their biggest reality hits including Love Is Blind, Too Hot to Handle, The Circle, and more. Contestants couple up and compete to prove they've found their 'perfect match' while new arrivals and strategic gameplay keep everyone on their toes. The show has become must-watch TV for Netflix reality fans.

faqs.question: Where is Perfect Match filmed?
faqs.answer: Perfect Match films at a luxury villa in Panama. While the exact location is kept private during production, the villa features a stunning pool, ocean views, and the tropical ambiance perfect for romance and drama.

faqs.question: Which Netflix shows are contestants from?
faqs.answer: Perfect Match features alumni from Love Is Blind, Too Hot to Handle, The Circle, Selling Sunset, Dated & Related, The Mole, and other Netflix reality series. It's a who's who of Netflix reality royalty.

travelTips: Panama City offers a mix of modern skyline and historic Casco Viejo
The San Blas Islands provide a similar tropical villa experience
Bocas del Toro is perfect for beach lovers seeking paradise

meta.title: Perfect Match Filming Location | Netflix Villa Guide
meta.description: Discover where Perfect Match is filmed. Complete guide to the Netflix dating show's Panama villa location.

shows.name: The Ultimatum: Marry or Move On
shows.description: Couples on the verge of marriage give each other ultimatums, then swap partners for a trial marriage before deciding their fate. The controversial format has sparked endless debates about relationships and commitment.
shows.longDescription: The Ultimatum takes couples who disagree about marriage and puts them through an intense experiment: spend three weeks living with someone new, then three weeks back with your original partner, before making a final decision at the altar. The show has featured both straight and LGBTQ+ couples in different seasons and has become known for its dramatic confrontations and surprising outcomes.

faqs.question: Where is The Ultimatum filmed?
faqs.answer: The Ultimatum primarily films in Austin, Texas. The show uses various apartments and venues around the city for the trial marriages and group gatherings. Some seasons have also filmed in Los Angeles.

faqs.question: Are the apartments on The Ultimatum real?
faqs.answer: Yes, the apartments shown on The Ultimatum are real furnished apartments in Austin. The production rents multiple units in the same building to facilitate filming and allow for dramatic drop-bys between couples.

travelTips: Austin's South Congress (SoCo) area is perfect for date spots
Many reunion scenes film at rooftop bars downtown
The food scene is incredible - don't miss Franklin BBQ
Lake Austin offers romantic boat tours like those seen on dates

meta.title: The Ultimatum Filming Locations | Austin & LA Venues
meta.description: Explore The Ultimatum filming locations in Austin, Texas and Los Angeles.

shows.name: Temptation Island
shows.description: Couples test their relationships by living separately with singles on a tropical island, facing temptations that challenge their commitment. The revival brought back the iconic 2000s format with even more drama.
shows.longDescription: Originally airing from 2001-2003, Temptation Island was revived in 2019 with a new cast and more dramatic stakes. Four couples at a crossroads in their relationships travel to a tropical island where they live separately with singles who try to tempt them away. The show is known for its bonfires where couples watch video clips of their partners with other people.

faqs.question: Where is Temptation Island filmed?
faqs.answer: The revival of Temptation Island films in Maui, Hawaii. The show uses luxury villas for the men's and women's houses and the Andaz Maui resort for various date locations. The dramatic bonfire scenes are filmed on private beaches.

faqs.question: What resort is featured on Temptation Island?
faqs.answer: The Andaz Maui at Wailea Resort is featured prominently for dates and challenges. This five-star resort offers stunning ocean views, multiple pools, and the Morimoto Maui restaurant.

travelTips: Stay at Andaz Maui for the full Temptation Island experience
Wailea Beach is perfect for sunset walks like on the show
Book a luau for that island romance vibe
Drive the Road to Hana for adventure dates

meta.title: Temptation Island Filming Location | Maui Hawaii Guide
meta.description: Visit the Temptation Island filming location in Maui, Hawaii. Stay at the same resorts and visit the beaches from the show.

shows.name: FBoy Island
shows.description: Three women try to distinguish between 'Nice Guys' and 'FBoys' while dating on a tropical island, with $100,000 on the line. The tongue-in-cheek comedy has developed a devoted following.
shows.longDescription: FBoy Island puts a unique spin on dating shows by having three women date 24 men - half of whom are self-proclaimed 'Nice Guys' looking for love and half are 'FBoys' looking to win the money. Hosted by comedian Nikki Glaser, the show balances genuine romance with self-aware comedy, making it a refreshing addition to the reality dating landscape.

faqs.question: Where is FBoy Island filmed?
faqs.answer: FBoy Island Season 1 filmed in the Cayman Islands at a private villa. Season 2 filmed in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico at a luxury resort, and Season 3 filmed in New Caledonia, a French territory in the South Pacific.

faqs.question: Can you visit the FBoy Island locations?
faqs.answer: While the private villas aren't available, you can visit all three destinations. The Cayman Islands offer world-class diving, Cabo has incredible resorts and nightlife, and New Caledonia provides off-the-beaten-path tropical adventure.

travelTips: Cabo's Medano Beach has similar vibes to the Season 2 setting
Grand Cayman's Seven Mile Beach is worth the visit
New Caledonia is a hidden gem with French-Polynesian culture
All locations offer amazing snorkeling and diving

meta.title: FBoy Island Filming Locations | Cabo, Cayman Islands & More
meta.description: Discover FBoy Island filming locations across the Cayman Islands, Cabo San Lucas, and New Caledonia.

shows.name: Married at First Sight
shows.tagline: Will they say 'I do' to a stranger?
shows.description: Experts match strangers who meet for the first time at the altar, then follow their journey through an 8-week experiment to decide if they'll stay married or divorce. The social experiment has produced real lasting marriages.
shows.longDescription: Married at First Sight is one of reality TV's most daring experiments: complete strangers are legally married at the altar after being matched by experts. Couples then live together for 8 weeks before Decision Day, when they must decide whether to stay married or divorce. The show has filmed in numerous cities across America and has spawned multiple international versions.

faqs.question: Where does Married at First Sight film?
faqs.answer: MAFS films in different cities each season, including Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Houston, Los Angeles, Nashville, New Orleans, Philadelphia, San Diego, and Washington DC. Couples live in apartments in the filming city during the experiment.

faqs.question: Where do MAFS weddings take place?
faqs.answer: Weddings are filmed at various venues in each city, often at elegant hotels, estates, or event spaces. The exact venues are usually revealed after the season airs, and many are available for public bookings.

travelTips: Each city offers unique date spots featured on the show
Nashville seasons showcase the city's music scene
New Orleans episodes highlight Cajun cuisine and culture
San Diego seasons feature beautiful beach ceremonies

meta.title: Married at First Sight Filming Locations | All Cities Guide
meta.description: Explore MAFS filming locations across America. Wedding venues, apartments, and date spots from all 18 seasons.

shows.name: Love Island UK
shows.tagline: Couple up or get dumped from the island
shows.description: The original modern Love Island that sparked a global phenomenon. British singles couple up in a Majorcan villa for the chance at love and a cash prize. The UK version remains the gold standard for the format.
shows.longDescription: Love Island UK revolutionized reality TV when it launched in 2015, becoming a cultural phenomenon that dominates British summers. The format of coupling up, public voting, and Casa Amor has been replicated worldwide, but the UK version retains its crown with its iconic Majorcan villa, memorable catchphrases, and influencer-launching power.

faqs.question: Where is the Love Island UK villa?
faqs.answer: The Love Island UK villa is located in Sant Llorenc des Cardassar, Mallorca, Spain. The show uses a custom villa that's rebuilt and redesigned each year. Winter seasons have filmed in South Africa near Cape Town.

faqs.question: Can you visit the Love Island villa?
faqs.answer: The villa itself is private and used exclusively for production. However, the surrounding area of Mallorca offers similar vibes with beautiful beaches, nightclubs, and Mediterranean charm. Many fans visit Mallorca during Love Island season.

travelTips: Visit Mallorca in June-July during filming for peak Love Island vibes
Magaluf and Palma offer the nightlife scene featured in challenges
Book a villa in Sant Llorenc for the closest experience
Cape Town's Camps Bay has incredible beach villa options

meta.title: Love Island UK Villa Location | Mallorca Spain Guide
meta.description: Visit Love Island UK's Mallorca villa location. Complete guide to the Spanish island and Cape Town winter filming.

shows.name: The Circle
shows.description: Players live in separate apartments communicating only through a social media platform called 'The Circle,' where catfishing is encouraged and popularity determines the winner. A unique twist on dating and social dynamics.
shows.longDescription: The Circle takes the dating show format and adds a digital twist: contestants live in isolated apartments and can only communicate through a custom social media platform. Players can be themselves or create entirely fake personas, leading to catfishing, strategic alliances, and surprising reveals. While not strictly a dating show, romance frequently blossoms both between real personas and catfish.

faqs.question: Where is The Circle filmed?
faqs.answer: The Circle US is filmed in a purpose-built apartment building in Salford, Greater Manchester, UK. The same building is used for multiple international versions including The Circle UK, France, and Brazil.

faqs.question: Are The Circle apartments real?
faqs.answer: Yes, contestants live in real, fully functional apartments in the same building but are completely isolated from each other. The building was converted specifically for the show and features the signature Circle screens in each unit.

travelTips: Salford's MediaCity offers behind-the-scenes TV experiences
Manchester's Northern Quarter has the trendy vibes of the show
The building isn't open to public but the area is worth visiting
Combine with a visit to Manchester's excellent food scene

meta.title: The Circle Filming Location | Salford Apartments Guide
meta.description: Discover where The Circle is filmed. Visit the Salford apartment building and explore the Manchester area.

shows.name: Love on the Spectrum
shows.description: Following young adults on the autism spectrum as they navigate the world of dating and relationships. The heartwarming Australian-turned-American series celebrates neurodiversity and genuine connection.
shows.longDescription: Love on the Spectrum began as an Australian documentary series before Netflix brought it to American audiences. The show follows young adults on the autism spectrum as they work with relationship coaches and go on dates, showcasing the universal desire for love and connection. It's become beloved for its genuine moments and positive representation.

faqs.question: Where is Love on the Spectrum filmed?
faqs.answer: The original Australian version films around Sydney, Australia. The US version films primarily in Southern California, including Los Angeles and San Diego, featuring local date venues and participants' homes.

travelTips: Sydney's Darling Harbour features many date locations
San Diego's Balboa Park offers romantic stroll spots
Many restaurants from the show welcome visitors

meta.title: Love on the Spectrum Filming Locations | Australia & US
meta.description: Explore Love on the Spectrum filming locations in Sydney, Los Angeles, and San Diego.

shows.name: Dating Around
shows.description: Each episode follows one person on five first dates, edited to feel like a single evening. The stylish, cinematic approach to dating shows earned critical acclaim and an Emmy.
shows.longDescription: Dating Around broke the reality dating mold with its artful, unscripted approach. Each episode features one person going on five blind dates at the same restaurant, with the dater choosing one person for a second date. The show's beautiful cinematography, diverse casting, and genuine conversations earned it an Emmy for Outstanding Structured Reality Program.

faqs.question: Where is Dating Around filmed?
faqs.answer: Season 1 filmed exclusively in New York City at various bars and restaurants. Season 2 moved to New Orleans, showcasing the city's unique food and drink scene. All dates take place at real, publicly accessible venues.

faqs.question: What restaurants are featured on Dating Around?
faqs.answer: NYC locations include the Nowadays beer garden, The Commodore, and King. New Orleans spots include Justine, Cane & Table, and Jewel of the South. All are excellent date spots.

travelTips: Book a table at Justine in NOLA for the full experience
NYC's East Village has many featured venues
These restaurants are popular - make reservations
Visit during off-peak hours for a quieter experience

meta.title: Dating Around Filming Locations | NYC & New Orleans Restaurants
meta.description: Visit the bars and restaurants from Dating Around in New York City and New Orleans.

shows.name: Are You The One?
shows.description: Twenty singles try to find their 'perfect match' using compatibility algorithms. If all pairs find their matches by the end of the season, they win $1 million. Drama, hookups, and strategic gameplay ensue.
shows.longDescription: Are You The One combines dating with game theory as 20 singles must figure out who their algorithmically-determined 'perfect match' is. Using limited information from the Truth Booth and Match Up Ceremonies, contestants must balance following their hearts with strategic thinking. Season 8 made history as the first sexually fluid season.

faqs.question: Where is Are You The One filmed?
faqs.answer: AYTO has filmed in various tropical locations including Hawaii (multiple seasons), Colombia, Dominican Republic, and even New Orleans for a spin-off. The production uses luxury villas that can accommodate all 20+ cast members.

travelTips: Hawaii's North Shore offers similar villa-style accommodations
Colombia's Cartagena coast is increasingly popular
Many seasons feature local adventure activities

meta.title: Are You The One Filming Locations | Hawaii & Beyond
meta.description: Discover AYTO filming locations across Hawaii, Colombia, and more tropical destinations.

shows.name: Sexy Beasts
shows.tagline: Love is blind... and very, very hairy
shows.description: Singles date while wearing elaborate prosthetic makeup to focus on personality over appearance. The outlandish costumes range from dolphins to demons in this unique dating experiment.
shows.longDescription: Sexy Beasts took the 'love is blind' concept literally by having daters wear elaborate creature prosthetics during dates. From devils to pandas to aliens, the wild costumes became the show's signature, creating some of the most visually memorable moments in dating TV history.

faqs.question: Where is Sexy Beasts filmed?
faqs.answer: Sexy Beasts films in the United Kingdom, primarily in studios and locations around London and the English countryside. The elaborate prosthetics require extensive makeup time and controlled environments.

travelTips: London offers great date spots featured in reveal scenes
The Cotswolds provides romantic countryside settings
Hyde Park makes for scenic romantic strolls

meta.title: Sexy Beasts Filming Locations | UK Studio & Date Spots
meta.description: Discover where Sexy Beasts is filmed in the United Kingdom.

shows.name: The Courtship
shows.description: A modern woman searches for love Regency-style, with suitors in period costume competing for her heart at an English estate. Bridgerton fans rejoice.
shows.longDescription: Capitalizing on the Bridgerton phenomenon, The Courtship transported modern dating back to the Regency era. Suitors dressed in period attire competed for a woman's heart at a stunning English castle, complete with dance cards, chaperoned dates, and old-fashioned romance.

faqs.question: Where is The Courtship filmed?
faqs.answer: The Courtship filmed at Castle Howard in Yorkshire, England - the same stunning estate used in the original Brideshead Revisited. The castle's baroque architecture and extensive grounds provided the perfect Regency backdrop.

faqs.question: Can you visit Castle Howard?
faqs.answer: Yes! Castle Howard is open to the public year-round. Visitors can tour the grand house, explore the gardens, and even stay in estate cottages. It's one of England's most magnificent stately homes.

travelTips: Castle Howard offers summer events and seasonal exhibits
The gardens are spectacular in spring and summer
Nearby York offers additional Regency-era architecture
Stay at the castle's holiday cottages for full immersion

meta.title: The Courtship Filming Location | Castle Howard Yorkshire
meta.description: Visit Castle Howard, the stunning English estate where The Courtship was filmed.

shows.name: Love Without Borders
shows.description: American singles relocate to foreign countries to meet their match, living in the culture and deciding whether love can transcend borders. A twist on 90 Day Fiance themes.
shows.longDescription: Love Without Borders follows Americans who agree to move abroad to meet a potential match selected by experts. Participants relocate to countries like Ecuador, Costa Rica, Sweden, and Japan, immersing in new cultures while pursuing love.

faqs.question: What countries are featured on Love Without Borders?
faqs.answer: Season 1 featured matches in Ecuador, Costa Rica, Sweden, Japan, and Turkey. Participants lived in these countries for weeks while dating their match and experiencing local culture.

travelTips: Ecuador offers incredible nature from Galapagos to Amazon
Costa Rica's Nicoya Peninsula is a Blue Zone for longevity
Sweden's cities are incredibly romantic in summer
Japan's cultural richness provides endless exploration

meta.title: Love Without Borders Filming Locations | 5 Countries Guide
meta.description: Explore the countries featured on Love Without Borders: Ecuador, Costa Rica, Sweden, Japan, and Turkey.

shows.name: Indian Matchmaking
shows.tagline: Sima Aunty will find you a match
shows.description: Follow matchmaker Sima Taparia as she helps Indian singles find partners through traditional matchmaking, balancing family expectations with modern desires. A fascinating look at arranged marriage culture.
shows.longDescription: Indian Matchmaking follows Mumbai-based matchmaker Sima Taparia as she helps clients in India and the US find suitable partners. The show explores the tension between traditional Indian matchmaking customs and modern dating expectations, with Sima's catchphrases and personality making her an internet sensation.

faqs.question: Where is Indian Matchmaking filmed?
faqs.answer: Indian Matchmaking films across India (primarily Mumbai and Delhi) and various US cities including Houston, Chicago, Los Angeles, and New York. The show follows clients in their homes and on dates in their respective cities.

travelTips: Mumbai's Juhu Beach is featured in many scenes
Delhi's India Gate area offers iconic backdrop
Houston's Sugar Land suburb has a large Indian community
Many featured restaurants celebrate Indian cuisine

meta.title: Indian Matchmaking Filming Locations | Mumbai, Delhi & US Cities

shows.name: Love in Paradise: The Caribbean
shows.description: Americans fall for people they met while vacationing in the Caribbean and must decide if paradise romance can become real-world love. A tropical twist on 90 Day Fiance.
shows.longDescription: Love in Paradise follows couples who met during Caribbean vacations and are trying to make their holiday romances work in real life. From Jamaica to the Dominican Republic to Costa Rica, the show explores the challenges of long-distance relationships that began in tropical paradise.

faqs.question: What Caribbean destinations are featured?
faqs.answer: Love in Paradise has featured relationships in Jamaica, Dominican Republic, Haiti, Barbados, Puerto Rico, and Costa Rica, among other Caribbean and Latin American destinations.

travelTips: Jamaica's Negril is a classic spot for vacation romance
Punta Cana offers all-inclusive resort vibes

shows.name: 90 Day Fianc√©
shows.description: Follow couples who have 90 days to decide if they should get married after one partner arrives in the US on a K-1 visa. The groundbreaking TLC franchise has spawned over a dozen spin-offs and become a cultural phenomenon.
shows.longDescription: 90 Day Fianc√© introduced viewers to the complexities of international romance through the lens of the K-1 'fianc√© visa' process. American citizens bring their foreign partners to the US, where they must marry within 90 days or the partner must return home. The show has expanded into a massive franchise including Before the 90 Days, Happily Ever After, The Other Way, and many more, featuring couples from over 50 countries.

faqs.question: What countries are featured on 90 Day Fianc√©?
faqs.answer: The franchise has featured couples from over 50 countries including Ukraine, Russia, Brazil, Colombia, Philippines, Nigeria, Morocco, South Africa, Thailand, India, Tunisia, Dominican Republic, Mexico, UK, Australia, and many more. The Other Way spin-off follows Americans moving abroad.

faqs.question: What is the K-1 visa process?
faqs.answer: The K-1 visa allows foreign fianc√©s of US citizens to enter America for 90 days to get married. After marriage, they can apply for permanent residency. The process typically takes 6-9 months and costs around $2,000 in filing fees.

faqs.question: How many 90 Day Fianc√© spin-offs are there?
faqs.answer: There are over 15 spin-offs including Before the 90 Days, Happily Ever After, The Other Way, The Single Life, UK, and pillow talk commentary shows. The franchise is TLC's most successful programming.

travelTips: The Philippines' Cebu and Manila are frequently featured destinations
Colombia's Medell√≠n has become a popular tourism destination
Morocco's Marrakech offers incredible cultural immersion
Brazil's Amazon and beach towns feature in romantic seasons

meta.title: 90 Day Fianc√© Filming Locations | 50+ Countries Guide
meta.description: Complete guide to 90 Day Fianc√© filming locations across 50+ countries worldwide.

shows.name: Single's Inferno
shows.description: Korean singles compete on a deserted island ('Inferno') where they can only escape to a luxury resort ('Paradise') by coupling up. The sleek Korean production has become a global hit showcasing Seoul's dating culture.
shows.longDescription: Single's Inferno brought K-drama aesthetics to the dating show format. Contestants live on a sparse island with basic facilities, but can only escape to a luxury resort if they successfully couple up for overnight dates. The show's combination of stunning Korean contestants, strategic gameplay, and gorgeous cinematography has made it Netflix's most successful Korean reality show.

faqs.question: Where is Single's Inferno filmed?
faqs.answer: Single's Inferno films the 'Inferno' sequences on a specially constructed set in South Korea, while 'Paradise' scenes are filmed at luxury resorts and hotels around Seoul and Jeju Island. Season 3 featured the stunning Signiel Seoul hotel for Paradise dates.

faqs.question: Can you visit the Single's Inferno locations?
faqs.answer: The Paradise resort locations are publicly bookable. Signiel Seoul (Season 3) offers rooms from $400/night. Many contestants' post-show date spots in Gangnam and Hongdae are popular with fans.

faqs.question: Why is the show called Single's Inferno?
faqs.answer: The island represents 'Inferno' where singles are stuck until they find love. Coupling up allows them to escape to 'Paradise' for romantic overnight dates with luxury accommodations, gourmet food, and privacy.

travelTips: Seoul's Gangnam district features many filming locations and date spots
Signiel Seoul offers the same luxury Paradise experience from Season 3
Jeju Island is Korea's honeymoon capital with stunning scenery
K-beauty shopping in Myeongdong is perfect for fans of the contestants' style

meta.title: Single's Inferno Filming Locations | Seoul & Paradise Hotels Guide
meta.description: Visit Single's Inferno filming locations. Book the Paradise hotels, explore Seoul date spots, and experience Korean dating culture.

shows.name: Ex on the Beach
shows.tagline: Your ex is about to crash your vacation
shows.description: Singles arrive at a tropical resort expecting a fun vacation, but their exes start showing up to stir drama. The US version of the hit British format delivers maximum chaos.
shows.longDescription: Ex on the Beach takes vacation romance and adds a cruel twist: your ex shows up via the infamous 'Tablet of Terror.' The show has become known for explosive confrontations, messy hookups, and the unpredictable chaos that ensues when past and present collide in paradise. The format originated in the UK but the US version has developed its own wild identity.

faqs.question: Where is Ex on the Beach filmed?
faqs.answer: Ex on the Beach USA has filmed in various beach locations including Malibu (California), Hawaii's North Shore, Gran Canaria (Spain), and Colombia. The show uses luxury beach villas that accommodate large casts.

faqs.question: What is the Tablet of Terror?
faqs.answer: The Tablet of Terror is a device that alerts contestants when a new ex is about to arrive. It's become iconic for the dramatic reactions it causes as contestants learn their past is catching up with them.

travelTips: Malibu's beach house rentals offer similar vibes
Hawaii's North Shore is perfect for surfing and drama
Gran Canaria has incredible beaches and nightlife
Cartagena, Colombia offers colonial charm and beach access

meta.title: Ex on the Beach Filming Locations | Beach Villa Guide
meta.description: Discover Ex on the Beach filming locations from Malibu to Hawaii to Spain.

shows.name: The Ultimatum: Queer Love
shows.description: The groundbreaking LGBTQ+ version of The Ultimatum featuring queer women navigating love, commitment, and the ultimate relationship test. A historic moment for queer representation in reality dating.
shows.longDescription: The Ultimatum: Queer Love made history as the first major dating show to feature an entirely LGBTQ+ cast. Five couples at a crossroads face the same ultimatum experiment as the original show but with the added complexity of navigating queer relationships and identity. The show earned praise for its authentic representation and emotional depth.

faqs.question: Where is The Ultimatum: Queer Love filmed?
faqs.answer: The show films in Los Angeles, with trial marriages taking place in apartments around the city. West Hollywood and Silver Lake, known for their LGBTQ+ communities, feature prominently in date locations.

faqs.question: How is the queer version different from the original?
faqs.answer: Beyond featuring queer women, the show addresses unique aspects of LGBTQ+ relationships including coming out, chosen family dynamics, and navigating societal pressures. The cast praised the authentic representation.

travelTips: West Hollywood's The Abbey is an iconic LGBTQ+ venue
Silver Lake has a thriving queer arts and dining scene
Los Angeles Pride events take place each June
Explore DTLA's diverse food and cultural scene

meta.title: The Ultimatum: Queer Love Filming Locations | LA Guide
meta.description: Explore The Ultimatum: Queer Love filming locations in Los Angeles and West Hollywood.

shows.name: Dated and Related
shows.tagline: Find love with your sibling watching
shows.description: Pairs of siblings enter a villa together where they must help each other find love while witnessing each other's dating escapades. Awkwardness guaranteed.
shows.longDescription: Dated and Related puts a uniquely uncomfortable twist on dating shows: siblings compete together. While one sibling dates, the other watches and offers advice (or judgment). The show filmed in the South of France and features the beautiful chaos of family dynamics meeting romantic drama.

faqs.question: Where is Dated and Related filmed?
faqs.answer: Dated and Related films at a stunning villa on the French Riviera, near Cannes. The Mediterranean setting provides a glamorous backdrop for romantic adventures and sibling squabbles alike.

faqs.question: How does the sibling format work?
faqs.answer: Siblings enter the villa together and must witness each other's romantic pursuits. They offer advice, express concern, and sometimes get way too involved in each other's love lives. It's equal parts supportive and mortifying.

travelTips: The French Riviera is Europe's premier summer destination
Cannes' La Croisette offers glamorous beach club vibes
Nice's Old Town has incredible restaurants and nightlife
Rent a villa in Antibes for the full experience

shows.name: Joe Millionaire: For Richer or Poorer
shows.description: The revival of the classic show features two bachelors - one actually wealthy, one not - competing for love while women try to guess who's who. A twist on gold-digger concerns.
shows.longDescription: Joe Millionaire returned in 2022 with a clever update: two Joes, one actually a millionaire and one a regular guy. Women must navigate their feelings without knowing which bachelor has the fortune. The revival filmed at a stunning Missouri estate, bringing back the guilty pleasure format for a new generation.

faqs.question: Where is Joe Millionaire 2022 filmed?
faqs.answer: The revival filmed at the stunning Lakeview Xtreme Estate in the Missouri Ozarks. The 20,000+ square foot mansion sits on a private lake and features incredible amenities including a waterpark.

faqs.question: Can you visit the Joe Millionaire estate?
faqs.answer: Yes! Lakeview Xtreme Estate is available for vacation rentals, sleeping up to 30 guests. It's perfect for group trips and features the same grand spaces seen on the show.

travelTips: The Missouri Ozarks offer beautiful lake country scenery
Branson is nearby with entertainment and attractions
Lake living provides relaxed romance vibes
Book the estate for a group reality TV experience

shows.name: MILF Manor
shows.description: Women over 40 and younger men date at a Mexican resort, with a shocking twist: the men are the women's own sons' peers. TLC's most controversial dating show delivers maximum awkwardness.
shows.longDescription: MILF Manor pushed reality TV boundaries by having women in their 40s-60s date men in their 20s-30s at a luxury Mexican resort. The shocking twist? The men were friends with the women's sons, who eventually showed up. The show became a viral sensation for its wild premise and actually heartwarming moments.

faqs.question: Where is MILF Manor filmed?
faqs.answer: MILF Manor films at luxury resorts in Mexico, including locations in Cabo San Lucas and Los Cabos. The all-inclusive resort setting provides the backdrop for poolside flirtation and dramatic reveals.

faqs.question: What's the twist in MILF Manor?
faqs.answer: The women's sons arrive to see their moms dating men their own age - often their own friends or peers. The resulting awkwardness and genuine emotional moments made the show a viral hit.

travelTips: Cabo San Lucas offers incredible resorts for any age
Los Cabos' beaches are perfect for romantic getaways
All-inclusive resorts provide the full MILF Manor experience
Visit during shoulder season for better rates

shows.name: Ready to Love
shows.description: Successful Black singles over 30 search for lasting love in this mature, thoughtful dating show. Will Packer's production focuses on accomplished professionals seeking genuine connection.
shows.longDescription: Ready to Love fills an important gap in reality dating by centering Black singles over 30 who are established in their careers and ready for serious relationships. Produced by Will Packer, the show has featured singles in Atlanta, Houston, Miami, DC, and other cities with significant Black professional communities. It's known for its more mature approach to dating TV.

faqs.question: Where is Ready to Love filmed?
faqs.answer: Ready to Love films in different cities each season, including Atlanta, Houston, Miami, Washington DC, Los Angeles, and Dallas. Each location showcases the local Black professional scene and date venues.

faqs.question: What makes Ready to Love different?
faqs.answer: The show focuses on successful Black singles over 30, with less drama and more genuine conversation about relationships, careers, and what people want in partners. It's a more mature take on dating TV.

travelTips: Atlanta's Buckhead has upscale venues featured on the show

shows.name: Love Island: All Stars

shows.longDescription: Love Island: All Stars takes the most beloved (and most controversial) contestants from Love Island UK's history and brings them back together in a South African villa. The show films during the UK winter, giving fans year-round Love Island content. With established personalities and unresolved drama from previous seasons, the stakes are higher than ever.

faqs.question: Where is Love Island All Stars filmed?
faqs.answer: Love Island: All Stars films at a luxury villa near Cape Town, South Africa during the UK winter. The location offers stunning mountain and ocean views, plus warm weather when the UK is cold.

faqs.question: Who has appeared on All Stars?
faqs.answer: All Stars features memorable contestants from across Love Island UK's history, including winners, fan favorites, and villains. The mix of established personalities and old rivalries creates extra drama.

shows.name: Love After Lockup
shows.tagline: Will their love survive on the outside?
shows.description: Follows couples who began their relationships while one partner was incarcerated, documenting the challenges they face when the imprisoned partner is released.
shows.longDescription: Love After Lockup explores the unique challenges of relationships that started behind bars. When inmates are released, couples must navigate the real world together for the first time‚Äîdealing with family disapproval, financial struggles, and the question of whether prison romance can survive freedom. The show has spawned multiple spin-offs including Life After Lockup.

faqs.question: Is Love After Lockup real?
faqs.answer: Yes, the couples are real people who met while one partner was incarcerated. The show documents their genuine attempts to build relationships post-release, though some scenes may be produced for dramatic effect.

faqs.question: Where is Love After Lockup filmed?
faqs.answer: Filming takes place across the United States, following couples in their hometowns. Featured cities include Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Atlanta, various Texas cities, and more.

shows.name: Marrying Millions
shows.description: Wealthy individuals date and consider marriage with partners from vastly different financial backgrounds. Will love conquer the class divide?
shows.longDescription: Marrying Millions explores relationships where extreme wealth gaps test the bonds of love. Multi-millionaires bring working-class or financially struggling partners into their lavish lifestyles, facing skepticism from family and friends who question motives. The show features stunning mansions, luxury cars, and the real emotional challenges of bridging different worlds.

faqs.question: How rich are the millionaires on the show?
faqs.answer: Featured millionaires range from self-made entrepreneurs to those with generational wealth. Net worths featured on the show have ranged from $5 million to over $40 million.

faqs.question: Where are the mansions featured?
faqs.answer: The show has featured luxury homes in Dallas, Miami, the DC area, San Diego, and Denver. Many scenes showcase high-end restaurants, exclusive clubs, and vacation properties.

shows.name: Farmer Wants a Wife
shows.description: Single farmers looking for love invite city women to their farms to experience rural life and potentially find a lifelong partner. A heartland romance.
shows.longDescription: Farmer Wants a Wife brings the international format to America, following eligible farmers as they search for love. City women leave their urban lives to experience farm living, learning to milk cows, drive tractors, and embrace rural traditions. The genuine connections and beautiful farmland settings have made it a hit for viewers seeking wholesome romance.

faqs.question: Where is Farmer Wants a Wife filmed?
faqs.answer: The show films on actual working farms across America's heartland, including Nebraska, Wisconsin, Oklahoma, and Tennessee. Each farmer's segment takes place at their real family farm.

faqs.question: Is Farmer Wants a Wife popular worldwide?
faqs.answer: Yes! The format originated in the UK and has been hugely successful in Australia. The US version launched in 2023 and became Fox's most-watched unscripted series premiere in years.

travelTips: Agritourism is booming - many farms offer visitor experiences

Singles 'couple up' in a tropical paradise villa, facing recouplings, bombshells, and public votes. The show has filmed in Spain and Fiji, showcasing beautiful international destinations while Australian personalities bring their unique energy.

faqs.question: Where is Love Island Australia filmed?

faqs.question: How does it differ from UK Love Island?
faqs.answer: The Australian version has a more relaxed, fun vibe matching Aussie culture. It features Australian slang, beach culture references, and contestants known for their directness and humor.

shows.name: Love Is Blind: UK
shows.tagline: Can Brits find love sight unseen?
shows.description: The hit format comes to Britain as UK singles attempt to form emotional connections in the pods before seeing each other. Will love truly be blind?
shows.longDescription: Love Is Blind: UK brings the beloved format to Britain with a distinctly British sensibility. Singles from across the UK enter the pods hoping to find deep connections based purely on conversation. Engaged couples then retreat to a luxury UK location before returning to real life to plan their weddings. British humor, accents, and drama make this version uniquely entertaining.

faqs.question: Where is Love Is Blind UK filmed?
faqs.answer: The pods are set up in a purpose-built facility, while the couples' retreat takes place at a luxury UK destination. Real-life segments follow couples in cities like London and Manchester.

faqs.question: How is UK different from US?
faqs.answer: The UK version features British humor, cultural references, and tends to be slightly less dramatic. Brits bring their signature wit and self-deprecation to the pod conversations.

shows.name: My Mom, Your Dad
shows.tagline: Second chance at love, guided by kids
shows.description: Single parents get a second chance at love while their adult children secretly watch and influence from a nearby house. A wholesome twist on dating shows.
shows.longDescription: My Mom, Your Dad takes the dating show format and adds a heartwarming twist: adult children nominate their single parents for the show, then secretly observe and guide their romantic journeys from a house next door. The result is a surprisingly emotional series about finding love later in life, family dynamics, and letting go.

faqs.question: Where is My Mom, Your Dad filmed?
faqs.answer: The show films at a beautiful retreat house in Malibu, California. The parents' house and the kids' surveillance house are both luxury properties with ocean views.

faqs.question: How old are the parents on the show?
faqs.answer: Parents on the show are typically in their 40s to 50s, with adult children in their late teens to early 20s. The focus is on people seeking genuine second chances at love.

shows.name: Back with the Ex
shows.tagline: Should they reunite or move on?
shows.description: Former couples reunite to explore whether their past relationships deserve a second chance. Australian singles confront old feelings and unresolved issues.
shows.longDescription: Back with the Ex follows four Australians who reconnect with significant exes to determine if they should give love another go. Through shared apartments, therapy sessions, and revisiting meaningful locations, couples work through the issues that broke them up. It's a more mature, emotionally complex take on dating television.

faqs.question: Where is Back with the Ex filmed?
faqs.answer: The show films primarily in Melbourne and Sydney, Australia. Couples visit locations meaningful to their past relationships and share apartments while working through their issues.

faqs.question: Do the couples actually get back together?
faqs.answer: Some couples do reconcile while others decide to move on. The show provides a realistic look at whether second chances can work, not just manufactured happy endings.

shows.description: Four singles let astrology guide their search for love as the Astro Chamber matches them with potential partners based on zodiac compatibility.
shows.longDescription: Cosmic Love takes the dating show format and adds celestial guidance. Four leads representing different elements (fire, earth, air, water) receive matches based on their birth charts. A mystical 'Astro Chamber' provides guidance through the process, and eliminations consider both emotional connections and astrological compatibility. Perfect for astrology enthusiasts.

faqs.question: Where is Cosmic Love filmed?
faqs.answer: Cosmic Love films at a stunning desert retreat in the American Southwest, with mystical desert landscapes that complement the show's celestial themes. The 'Astro Chamber' is a specially designed set.

faqs.question: Is the astrology real?
faqs.answer: The show works with professional astrologers who analyze contestants' birth charts. While astrology is the framework, emotional compatibility still matters most for successful matches.

faqs.question: What kind of challenges do the men face?

shows.name: The Real Love Boat

Singles sail the Mediterranean on a Princess Cruises ship, stopping at romantic ports in Italy, Croatia, and Greece. Couples compete in challenges, go on fantasy dates in stunning locations, and face dramatic eliminations. The show offers viewers vicarious Mediterranean romance and actual cruise experiences.

faqs.question: What cruise line is featured?
faqs.answer: The show partners with Princess Cruises, filming aboard the Regal Princess. Viewers can book similar Mediterranean itineraries to experience the same ports and onboard amenities.

faqs.question: What ports are visited?
faqs.answer: The ship visits Barcelona (Spain), ports along the Italian coast, Dubrovnik (Croatia), Greek islands including Santorini, Monaco, and the French Riviera.
